pillars.name: Unparalleled Education
pillars.description: Students are presented with a wide variety of high level courses throughout their four years.

pillars.name: College Collaboration
pillars.description: A partnership with UHart allows our students to get a full taste of the college world.

pillars.name: Extracurricular Excellence
pillars.description: From popcorn club to robotics to track and field, there is something for everyone!

name: University High School of Science and Engineering
announcements:

warningBox.info:
Change of COVID Status from Yellow to Orange beginning Monday November 16th:

Please see the attached notices for how the change of Hartford Public Schools from Yellow to Orange will affect your UHSSE student.

Student Class Schedule:

Monday/Friday Schedule (For In Person and Virtual 9-12):
Block 1     8:10-9:30
Block 2     9:34-9:56
Block 3     10:00-11:52 (with 1/2 hour lunch by class)
Block 4     11:56-1:16
Block 5     1:20-2:40

Wednesday- students will work independently Block 1-5 through Google Classroom

Tuesday/Thursday Schedule (For In Person and Virtual 9-12): 
Block 6     8:10-10:07
Block 7     10:11- 12:40 (with 1/2 hour lunch by class)
Block 8     12:44-2:40

Questions? Call our main office at 860-695-9020.
